name: places/ChIJ7fHZCDxZwokRnTDansGPWZo
formattedAddress: 102 Eldridge St #2B, New York, NY 10002, USA
adrFormatAddress: 102 Eldridge St #2B, New York, NY 10002, USA

originalText.text: I visited Jivamukti for HaChi's class on their opening / inaugural class and it was so energetically and physically refreshing. The most perfect/classic signature Jivamukti class with a bit of Dharma and chanting at the beginning, an incredibly challenging yet accessible class, and a nourishing china gel massage throughout the class with really helpful assists. I know this is just the beginning, but I was really blown away and I hope everyone experiences it at least once!

originalText.text:
One of my favorite yoga studios in the city! A cozy, intimate studio with a powerhouse selection of teachers. Each teacher is supremely skilled and physical adjustments offered here are like no other. Really helpful for both beginner and advanced practitioners and helps to make class extremely accessible for all levels.

Classes start with chanting/meditation. Guide books are passed out in case you arenâ€™t familiar with the verses.

Tucked right above Granddaddy Cafe (perfect spot to grab a coffee after a weekend morning class)!

The founder, HaChi, is a gem!! A one of a kind teacher who is extremely knowledgeable and hands on.

originalText.text: It's great to have Jivamukti back to having a dedicated presence here in NYC! The studio brings it back to Jivamukti's roots in the Lower East Side with an intimate space to practice this important lineage. More than your run of the mill health club yoga class, Jivamukti or "liberation while living" brings yoga back to the origins of yogic philosophy as outlined in Patanjali's Yoga Sutras. This is a workout for the mind, body and soul.

originalText.text: Jiva is back in NYC ðŸ—½ woo hoo. Jivamukti has always been next level, the training all teachers receive is very authentic, comprehensive and covers all the branches of yoga, and so the classes you receive nurture and uplift, challenge and inspire and reflect the dedication and excellence of all the teachers. You are in safe hands, The new studio is beautiful, light filled, full of very happy plants, the walls painted a sublime coral and they have all the props you need to personalize your class. It is a very welcoming place, you can connect with yoga here if you are a beginner and finally get what this yoga is all about, and for the seasoned yogis it is the place that makes our heart sing, an ocean of bliss, a cool container to continue exploring yoga.

originalText.text: As a first-timer in Jivamukti, HaChi truly made me feel welcome into the practice. HaChiâ€™s class was energetically charged and at the same time just the right amount of physically challenging. HaChi provided very focused hands-on assistance to help you really feel the impact of the poses. This is now one of my favorite new studios in NYC - would highly recommend.
